Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293T cells stably expressing wild-type and mutant OGG1 proteins.

Readout description.Result Description: The mutant OGG1 protein had reduced levels of o-linked glycans compared to the wild-type protein.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each sample.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type OGG1 protein served as the positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No negative control was included in this experiment.

Validation controls B/LB.Description: A known benign OGG1 variant was used as a control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-tailed Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: OGG1 protein with normal o-glycosylation levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Reduced OGG1 protein o-linked glycans compared to the wild-type protein.
